title: Why can't we block people in the new client?
body: I actually really liked this feature, so that if I got someone in a later game, they would automatically be muted... Now I see the same player more than once, and I report them multiple times for the same thing, but I just can't get them to be permanently blocked anymore... Can we please add this feature back into the client?

replies.body:
The updated client is still in testing so not everything is up and running yet, like blocking.  In the meantime, you can use the legacy client as a workaround:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

I hope that helps!
